definition.title: EGI: Much More Than an NFT
definition.intro: EGI represents the natural evolution of NFTs, overcoming their limitations and adding concrete utility.
definition.summary: An EGI is a digital asset that combines artistic value with real utilities and measurable environmental impact, all certified on blockchain.

components.title: The Three Fundamental Components
components.subtitle: Each EGI consists of three elements working in perfect synergy

epp.title: EPP - Environmental Protection Programs
epp.description: Each EGI automatically allocates a share to verified environmental projects. It's not optional, it's part of every certificate's DNA.

goods.title: GOODS - Tangible Value
goods.description: The GOODS component represents concrete value: it can be artwork, a service, a right, or any asset with real utility.

creativity.title: INVENT - What Makes It Unique
creativity.description: The INVENT component is what makes each EGI truly special: evolved smart contracts, dynamic utilities, and participatory governance mechanisms.

functions.title: The 5 Revolutionary Functions
functions.subtitle: Each EGI carries unique capabilities that make it much more than a simple token

rebind.title: Rebind - Dynamic Linking
rebind.description: The Rebind function allows linking a digital EGI to a physical asset in the real world, creating a bridge between digital and tangible.

tokenization.title: Tokenization - Smart Fractionalization
tokenization.description: Tokenization allows dividing EGI ownership into shares, democratizing access to art and valuable assets.

multirole.title: Multirole - Multiple Roles
multirole.description: The Multirole system allows defining different roles for each EGI: creator, co-creator, patron, collector, each with specific rights.

interface.title: Interface - Interoperability
interface.description: EGIs are designed to be interoperable with other systems and platforms, thanks to open standards and documented APIs.

signature.title: Signature - Digital Signature
signature.description: Each EGI carries the creator's cryptographic digital signature, ensuring irrefutable authenticity and attribution.

advantages.title: Why Choose EGI
advantages.subtitle: Advantages over traditional NFTs and digital certificates

items.title: Positive Environmental Impact
items.description: Each EGI automatically contributes to environmental protection projects.

items.title: Guaranteed Authenticity
items.description: Immutable blockchain certification with creator's digital signature.

items.title: Total Transparency
items.description: Every transaction, royalty and contribution is traceable on blockchain.

items.title: Regulatory Compliance
items.description: Designed to comply with MiCA, GDPR and international regulations.

cta.title: Start Your Digital Renaissance Journey
cta.description: Discover how EGI can transform the way you create, collect and contribute to the environment.
